Sentencas: Yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ) is a common solid electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) because of its high electrical conductivity and high ionic transference number in both oxidizing and reducing atmospheres.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: Samarium doped ceria (SDC) has also been considered, as an alternative electrolyte material to YSZ for intermediate temperature SOFC because of its high conductivity at relatively low temperatures.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: Due to improved ionic conductivity of YSZ at high temperature (similar to 800 degrees C) and good conductivity of SDC in the intermediate temperature range (600-800 degrees C), the electrical properties of YSZ-SDC composites were investigated.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: Composites of YSZ and SDC with weight ratio 9.5:0.5, 9:1 and 8.5:1.5 were synthesized via glycine-nitrate route.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: XRD pattern of the systems revealed the formation of composite phases.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: Biphasic electrolyte microstructures were observed, in which SDC grains are dispersed in YSZ matrix.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: Relative density of the compositions was found to be more than 92% to the theoretical density.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: It was observed that the interface provides a channel for ionic transport, leading to a notable ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: With increase in SDC weight ratio the electrical conductivity was found to increase.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: For weight ratio 8.5:1.5 the electrical conductivity was found to be greater than that of YSZ in the temperature range 400-700 degrees C. Further, for weight ratio more than 8.5:1.5, conductivity was found to decreases due to the formation of a few other insulating impurity phases.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: The electrode polarisation was also found to reduce significantly with SDC in the composite electrolyte system.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method

Sentencas: Thus, such composite system may be useful for improving the ionic conductivity of the composite electrolytes.
Titulo: Electrical conductivity of YSZ-SDC composite solid electrolyte synthesized via glycine-nitrate method
